masutils.config.general.updateNotificati: Send notifications when new version of mod is released
masutils.config.mineshaft.toggle.@Toolti: You can fully disable all features of this category
masutils.config.mineshaft.corpseFinder.@: Create ESPs to all corpses in a mineshaft
masutils.config.mineshaft.profitHint.@To: When enter mineshaft send you a profit hint with calculations based on your stats and gear
masutils.config.mineshaft.party.mode.@To: You can enable or disable party mode
masutils.config.mineshaft.party.autowarp: Automatically warp your party when you entered mineshaft
masutils.config.mineshaft.party.autotran: Automatically transfer party leadership to who spawned mineshaft
masutils.config.mineshaft.party.messageo: Can be used for compatibility with another mods, you can send !pt in party chat
masutils.config.mineshaft.esp.toggle.@To: Mineshaft waypoint helps you to faster find a spawned mineshaft
masutils.config.mineshaft.esp.color.@Too: Color with which ESP will be created
